name: recognized university.
description:
The team says that the game introduces players to their new jobs as football coaches and football players, with each one having their own specialties. The players, while serving other goals, also have to work together in order to achieve their goals.
As for some of its mechanics, it's modeled after the Real Sports game series. Players are given the option of switching between different types of football (soccer, rugby, rugby-style) and additionally the ability to score goals. I'm pretty sure that anything that looks surprisingly similar to Real Sports in the way that it works would appeal to a lot of people. The whole thing should be in the hands of the next publisher for appropriate distribution. Source Share this: Twitter Facebook Reddit Tumblr Google More Email Print LinkedIn Pinterest Pocket
